EmailTemplate.description: US-0006467 Contract confirmation for FVF & Coupon
EmailTemplate.name: Contract confirmation for Coupon
EmailTemplate.subject: Coupon contract has been signed by {!Coupon_Seller__c.Seller__c} | Coupon: {!Coupon_Seller__c.Marketing_Coupon_Name__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Coupon_Seller__c.EBH_CouponSellerOwner__c},
This email is to inform you that coupon contract has been signed by {!Coupon_Seller__c.Seller__c} .
Click here to view the details: {!Coupon_Seller__c.Link}.
Thank you,
Hive team
